Package Enquiry

Class EnquiryManager

java.lang.Object
Utility.CSVReader
DataManager.EnquiryDBManager
Enquiry.EnquiryManager
public class EnquiryManager extends EnquiryDBManager
The EnquiryManager class manages user inquiries and replies, interacting with CSV data. It provides methods to retrieve, add, and manipulate enquiries and their replies.

    • getStudentEnquiries

      public static Enquiry[] getStudentEnquiries(Student s)
      Retrieves enquiries associated with a specific student.
      Parameters:
      s - The Student object for which enquiries are retrieved.
      Returns:
      An array of Enquiry objects associated with the specified student.

    • getCampEnquiries

      public static Enquiry[] getCampEnquiries(Camp camp)
      Retrieves enquiries associated with a specific camp.
      Parameters:
      camp - The Camp object for which enquiries are retrieved.
      Returns:
      An array of Enquiry objects associated with the specified camp.

    • getEnquiryByID

      public static Enquiry getEnquiryByID(String id)
      Retrieves an enquiry based on its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the enquiry.
      Returns:
      The Enquiry object with the specified ID, or null if not found.

    • getReplies

      public static EnquiryReply[] getReplies(Enquiry enquiry)
      Gets an array of EnquiryReply objects corresponding to the replies associated with this enquiry.
      Parameters:
      enquiry - The Enquiry object for which replies are retrieved.
      Returns:
      An array of EnquiryReply objects.

    • addEnquiry

      public static void addEnquiry(User sender, Camp camp, String message)
      Adds a new enquiry to the CSV file.
      Parameters:
      sender - The user sending the enquiry.
      camp - The camp related to the enquiry.
      message - The message content of the enquiry.

    • deleteEnquiry

      public static void deleteEnquiry(Enquiry toBeDeleted)
      Deletes an enquiry from the CSV file.
      Parameters:
      toBeDeleted - The Enquiry object to be deleted.

    • editEnquiry

      public static void editEnquiry(Enquiry toBeEdited)
      Edits an existing enquiry in the CSV file.
      Parameters:
      toBeEdited - The Enquiry object to be updated.

    • replyEnquiry

      public static void replyEnquiry(User replier, String reply, Enquiry enq)
      Adds a reply to the given enquiry, updating both the EnquiryReply and Enquiry databases.
      Parameters:
      replier - The user providing the reply.
      reply - The content of the reply.
      enq - The Enquiry object to which the reply is added.
